news.title: Nvidia can sell the more advanced H200 AI chip to China — but will Beijing want them?
news.summary: Nvidia received the green light from the U.S. to sell its advanced H200 chip to China. But there are questions over whether Beijing will allow this to happen.

news.title: From Llamas to Avocados: Meta's shifting AI strategy is causing internal confusion
news.summary: Meta’s push to develop its next frontier model, codenamed Avocado, under new AI leadership is creating internal friction as it races rivals OpenAI and Google.

news.title: U.S. uncovers scheme to reroute Nvidia GPUs worth $160 million to China despite export bans
news.summary: Authorities have shut down yet another China-linked smuggling network for Nvidia's AI chips. U.S. Attorneys office: The network was used to smuggle AI chips from China.

news.title: Ukraine at 'critical moment' in war as European allies ramp up pressure on Russia
news.summary: "The destiny of this country is the destiny of Europe," German Chancellor Friedrich Merz says. Merz: "We all know that the fate of Germany is in Europe's hands"

news.title: Trump ban on wind power projects overturned by federal judge
news.summary: Seventeen states led by New York Attorney General Letitia James sued Trump in May to overturn the president's ban. Seventeen states including New York and New Jersey sued to overturn Trump's ban in May.

news.title: Why the record rally for small-cap stocks could run into a big problem in 2026
news.summary: fundamentals finally have started to improve, says one money manager. Rising Treasury yields could be an roadblock for small caps, but fundamentals are improving.

news.title: ‘Where are we vulnerable?’ My husband and I are in our 50s. Our $450K mortgage is paid off. We have $500K in IRAs.
news.summary: “We will not be downsizing our home, but we do have rental income of about $1,500 per month,” she says.

news.title: AI stocks are flashing ‘Code Red’ — insiders at these familiar companies are seeing green
news.summary: The end of the AI boom has begun, and these consumer-focused stocks are playing to win. These are the stocks you should buy if you want to make money from AI.

news.title: Why Trump’s new $12 billion farm aid package is just a Band-Aid for struggling soybean growers
news.summary: The Trump administration’s $12 billion aid package may be too little, too late for American farmers. Soybean producers are suffering from the effects of a U.S.-instigated global trade war.

news.title: We’re in our 70s and childless. Who will take care of us and our fortune when we’re old?
news.summary: A care plan for solo agers is about more than just filling in names on forms. "It's not about filling out forms, it's about making sure you get the care you need," a doctor says.
